pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fst-Heterozygosity Smoothed Quantiles // A program to generate smoothed quantiles for the Fst-heterozygosity distribution. Designed for use with large numbers of loci (e.g., genome-wide SNPs). The best case for analyzing the Fst-heterozygosity distribution is when many populations (10) have been sampled. See Flanagan Jones (2017) doi:10.1093/jhered/esx048.
